ABC News:

A 15-year-old Brisbane boy with Asperger’s syndrome who went missing for two weeks has been found in Sydney, after riding his bike more than 950 kilometres down the Pacific Highway.

Absolutely incredible. I greatly admire this kid’s determination, resolve and physical endurance. I’m also impressed with his parents for acting rationally when they noticed him withdrawing money from his bank account by depositing extra funds so he’d have enough to pay for food.

The huge distances he covered day after day resemble the type of riding required to race a tour. A cycling team should pick him up.
